topic.title: Enable/Disable Linkus Client for Users
topic.shortdesc: After setting up the Linkus Server, you need to enable Linkus Client for extension users to allow them log in Linkus client. To disallow a user to use Linkus, you can disable Linkus Client for the user.

ol.li:
To disable Linkus Client for a specific user, do the followings:
Log in the PBX web interface, go to Linkus Linkus Client Settings .
Search the user by extension number or name.
Click to enable Linkus service for the user.The status will be switched to (Disabled).
To disable Linkus Client for all users, unselect the checkbox Enable Linkus Server on Linkus Server Settings page.
To disable Linkus Client for all users, unselect the checkbox Enable to disable Linkus server.
In the pop-up dialog box, click Yes to confirm.
